page.title: 07POPULATION: COILACRIECH
page.content: The area is very sparcely populated, with what houses there are concentrated in the valley bottom near the North and South Deeside roads and near the roads in Glen Gairn. At one time nearly all the cottages would have been tenented farms, but now a lot of farms have been ammalgamated and the farm houses bought by non-farmers - retired people or people workng in Ballater. On the South Deeside Road, however, the majority of the houses still belong to one land owner. Apart from farming there is little employment in the area.
